name: TARGET
description: TARGET is a shooting gallery. Yes, yes, the most common! Shoot on moving targets from more than 10 weapons - pistols, shotgune, rifle, machine gun, sniper rifle, bazooka and even hand grenades.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2.6 GHz / AMD Dual-Core Athlon 3.0 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: SM 3.0 with 512MB VRAM; NVIDIA GeForce 8500 GT / AMD Radeon HD 4650 or higer DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Quad-Core Processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: SM 3.0 with 1GB VRAM; NVIDIA GeForce GTX 280 / AMD Radeon HD 4830 or higer DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 3 GB available space
